title: Shadow King: The Life and Death of Henry VI
itunes:title: Shadow King: The Life and Death of Henry VI
itunes:subtitle: In a talk from our 2019 History Weekend in Winchester, Lauren Johnson discusses the tragic life of Henry VI. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
In a talk she delivered at our 2019 BBC History Magazine History Weekend in Winchester, historian and author Lauren Johnson discusses the tragic life of Henry VI whose catastrophic reign led to the bloodshed of the Wars of the Roses. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
